participant_1.background:
People hate that i obsess about the poor.
I like to make cellphone apps that would help heal our world.
I like to watch people pray together.
People don t like me too much but i like them anyways.

participant_2.background:
I collect comic books.
I only eat organic food.
I am allergic to dust.
I have an autograph collection with more than 2000 signatures.

content.text: Hello!
Hello!
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to collect comic books, eat organic food, and watch people pray together.
That sounds interesting. I'm not sure I understand why you like to watch people pray together.
I find it to be a very peaceful and calming experience. I also like to see how different people express their faith.
I'm glad you find it to be peaceful. I can understand that. I've never been much of a religious person, but I can appreciate the beauty of prayer.
It's not just about religion. It's about being connected to something larger than yourself.
I agree. That's a great way to put it.
What do you do for fun?
I like to make cellphone apps that would help heal our world. I also like to read and watch movies.
That's interesting. What kind of cellphone apps do you make?
I've made a few different types, but my favorite is one that helps people find food banks and shelters in their area.
That's a great idea! I'm sure a lot of people would find that helpful.
Thanks! I'm glad you think so.
So, what are you reading right now?
I'm reading a book about the history of the civil rights movement. It's really interesting.
I've never read a book about the civil rights movement. I might have to check it out.
You should! It's a really good read.
I will!
So, what's your favorite movie?
My favorite movie is The Shawshank Redemption. It's such a good movie.
I agree! I love that movie. It's so inspiring.
It is. It's a reminder that no matter how bad things get, there's always hope.
I agree. That's one of the reasons I love it so much.
